Articles.Content:
Since I have never posted it on the spacecraft exchange forums, I have been thinking about taking all of my grandest spaceships and re-do them with all of these new awesome features. I have the intention of doing this will all of my old ships.

***The Shepard Spacecraft Carrier***

> ![screenshot115t.png](http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/2149/screenshot115t.png)
> ![screenshot117oz.png](http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/9462/screenshot117oz.png)
> 
> ![screenshot118d.png](http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/8205/screenshot118d.png)

The assymetrical properties of this monster was what I thought to be truly amazing at the time, but now with purposed features, I will be able to build it again - the right way!

Wait, what!? An orbital spaceship that launches spaceships? Anyways, my hat\'s off to you, my good sir!

-That feel when you\'ll never be able to make something as awesome as this. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Want. Now.

also, i see that aircraft carrier deck is from the topic: aircraft carriers

did you get permission from him to use that peice if you will upload the .craft file of this?

(please please please realse it. i know its gonna kill my pc, but still ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

> 
> Want. Now.
> 
> also, i see that aircraft carrier deck is from the topic: aircraft carriers
> 
> did you get permission from him to use that peice if you will upload the .craft file of this?
> 
> (please please please realse it. i know its gonna kill my pc, but still ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

I\'m not sure if it will fall apart in the new version,

1, because it launched from the VAB

2, I don\'t know if there were any changes in the fuselage structure strength.

The closest I ever got to making something like this...

> ![PUKNp.png](http://i.imgur.com/PUKNp.png)

> ![0CYmV.png](http://i.imgur.com/0CYmV.png)

> 
> Good sir, you are a god.
I do believe that Tim is a member of the Kerbal God Pantheon, worshiped by Kerbals across Kerbin.

.craft? please!!!!!!!!

WOW that looks good.

I don\'t really want it anymore since it\'s an old and outdated model, it\'s huge and wonky, and overall useless. So I\'m giving it to you for free: [http://www./?42l47d6x38x97c3](http://www./?42l47d6x38x97c3)

Good luck taking off straight with it, though. Also this snotty beast can only run pre-0.15, so you\'ll need all of C7, NovaPunch, RedDwardIV\'s landing boards, and maybe some other mods lost in the depths of my mind\'s archives.
I completely forgot that I also changed this one to float in the water like the Yamato! (I remembered the time I torpedoed my Yamato with this thing)
Hey Tim can I get a .craft link to the ship at the top? And also to the mods i need to be able to fly your ship? Thanks a lot! -Jonah
